svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 24 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 24, 2024" date: "2024-08-24"
Eth News and Links
Eight years of Week in Ethereum News
All core devs
â€¢ All Core Devs - Consensus (ACDC) #140 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : client
teams debugging issues including a few bad blocks, currently not finalizing Pectra-devnet-3 : plan to
launch next week EIP7251 max effective balance : correlation penalty update, fixes overflow EIP7594
PeerDAS : EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra Blob
limits per transaction discussion Fulu named as next consensus layer upgrade and Fusaka (Fulu + Osaka)
for combined upgrade Probelab: Gossipsub analysis
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: Pectra-devnet-2 : client teams debugging issues including a few
bad blocks, currently not finalizing Pectra-devnet-3 : plan to launch next week EIP7251 max effective
balance : correlation penalty update, fixes overflow EIP7594 PeerDAS : EIP7742 uncouple blob count
between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra Blob limits per transaction discussion
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade:
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-2 : client teams debugging issues including a few bad blocks, currently not finalizing

Pectra-devnet-3 : plan to launch next week

â€¢ EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL & EL : general support for including in Pectra

Blob limits per transaction discussion

Fulu named as next consensus layer upgrade and Fusaka (Fulu + Osaka) for combined upgrade

Probelab: Gossipsub analysis
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Pectra testing call #1
Pectra testing call #1
â€¢ Consensus specs v1.5.0-alpha.5 : target for peerdas-devnet-2
Consensus specs v1.5.0-alpha.5 : target for peerdas-devnet-2
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #6 : Peerdas-devnet-2: launch in the next week Peerdas-devnet-3: rebase to Pectra,
launch in 2-3 weeks
PeerDAS breakout #6 :
â€¢ Peerdas-devnet-2: launch in the next week
Peerdas-devnet-2: launch in the next week
â€¢ Peerdas-devnet-3: rebase to Pectra, launch in 2-3 weeks
Peerdas-devnet-3: rebase to Pectra, launch in 2-3 weeks
â€¢ EOF Implementers call #56 : Frangio : ERC721/1155 need ISCONTRACT and upgradeable proxies could be
bricked by EOF contracts not able to DELEGATECALL a legacy contract
EOF Implementers call #56 :
â€¢ Frangio : ERC721/1155 need ISCONTRACT and upgradeable proxies could be bricked by EOF contracts not
able to DELEGATECALL a legacy contract
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.6% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.6% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority ( Lido reduced Geth
usage by 20% in Q2 ) Consensus layer: Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority ( Lido reduced Geth usage by 20% in Q2 )
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority ( Lido reduced Geth usage by 20% in Q2 )
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Toni WahrstÃ¤tter: Timing games economies of scale , 30% validator share can delay 0.8s longer than
5% share Reorgs analysis : trending down, mostly occurring in slot following epoch transitions
Toni WahrstÃ¤tter:
â€¢ Timing games economies of scale , 30% validator share can delay 0.8s longer than 5% share
Timing games economies of scale , 30% validator share can delay 0.8s longer than 5% share
â€¢ Reorgs analysis : trending down, mostly occurring in slot following epoch transitions
Reorgs analysis : trending down, mostly occurring in slot following epoch transitions
â€¢ Xatu consensus layer p2p tables : libp2p gossipsub beacon attestation, beacon block & blob sidecar
Xatu consensus layer p2p tables : libp2p gossipsub beacon attestation, beacon block & blob sidecar
â€¢ Nethermind: execution layer client performance via engine_NewPayload response times
Nethermind: execution layer client performance via engine_NewPayload response times
â€¢ ePBS p2p market : allows small builders to participate in the market
ePBS p2p market : allows small builders to participate in the market
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm v5.1.0 : bug fixes, remote signer public key persistence and experimental
support for multiple beacon nodes
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Prysm v5.1.0 : bug fixes, remote signer public key persistence and experimental support for multiple
beacon nodes
â€¢ Execution layer: Besu v24.8.0 : stack handling update & RPC service improvements
Execution layer:
â€¢ Besu v24.8.0 : stack handling update & RPC service improvements
For Stakers
â€¢ Somer Esatâ€™s staking guides updated to add Reth execution layer client
Layer 2
â€¢ Offchain Labs roadmap : Stylus, BoLD, censorship timeout, decentralized sequencer, fast withdrawals,
chain clusters, multi client support, adaptive pricing and zk hybrid proving
Offchain Labs roadmap : Stylus, BoLD, censorship timeout, decentralized sequencer, fast withdrawals,
â€¢ L2Beat optimistic rollup fraud proofs , comparing Arbitrum, Cartesi & Optimism
L2Beat optimistic rollup fraud proofs , comparing Arbitrum, Cartesi & Optimism
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals): RIP7759 : Layer 2 transaction fees
RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals):
â€¢ RIP7759 : Layer 2 transaction fees
â€¢ ERCs (application layer standards): ERC7757 : Instinct-based automatic transactions ERC7758 :
Transfer with authorization (ERC3009 update) ERC7760 : Minimal upgradeable proxies
ERCs (application layer standards):
â€¢ ERC7757 : Instinct-based automatic transactions
ERC7757 : Instinct-based automatic transactions

ERC7758 : Transfer with authorization (ERC3009 update)
â€¢ ERC7760 : Minimal upgradeable proxies
ERC7760 : Minimal upgradeable proxies
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Hardhat roadmap : OP Stack simulation & Solidity tests in v3, followed by portability via WASM,
external EDR API, improved Solidity debugging and simulation of more L2s
Hardhat roadmap : OP Stack simulation & Solidity tests in v3, followed by portability via WASM,
â€¢ Remix v0.53.0 : generate proofs in Circom compiler plugin
Remix v0.53.0 : generate proofs in Circom compiler plugin
â€¢ SOLX : transpile TypeScript to Solidity in Foundry tests & scripts
SOLX : transpile TypeScript to Solidity in Foundry tests & scripts
â€¢ web3.py v7 : redesigned WebSocketProvider & new AsyncIPCProvider with subscriptions, class based
middleware, batch requests and more ABI utility methods
web3.py v7 : redesigned WebSocketProvider & new AsyncIPCProvider with subscriptions, class based
â€¢ Brontes : analytics pipeline to identify MEV, built on Reth
Brontes : analytics pipeline to identify MEV, built on Reth
â€¢ Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): implements final FIPS 203/204/205 specs
Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): implements final FIPS 203/204/205 specs
â€¢ CTFs: 5/9 Tardis : past Curta CTFs to play locally
CTFs:
â€¢ 5/9 Tardis : past Curta CTFs to play locally
â€¢ Scaffold-ETH 2 extensions hackathon , submit by September 2
Scaffold-ETH 2 extensions hackathon , submit by September 2
Security
â€¢ Whale $55M phishing attack , ownership of Maker vault changed
Ecosystem
â€¢ Vitalik: fundamentals are actually crazy strong right now
Vitalik: fundamentals are actually crazy strong right now
â€¢ Etherscan token standard checker : check if contract is ERC20/721/1155 compliant

Enterprise
â€¢ Sony Block Solutions Labs (Sony joint venture) Soneium : planned OP Stack rollup
Sony Block Solutions Labs (Sony joint venture) Soneium : planned OP Stack rollup
â€¢ State Street partner with Taurus to provide digital asset products to institutional investors
State Street partner with Taurus to provide digital asset products to institutional investors
Job Listings
â€¢ Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats

gwei 17k ETH net issuance this week

ETHBTC : currently 0.043
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ US Treasury removed unhosted wallet rule
US Treasury removed unhosted wallet rule
â€¢ Coindesk: token theater , US employees claimed geoblocked airdrops
